page.title: 04SHERIFFHALES MANOR HOUSE
page.content:
{THE MANOR HOUSE - SHERIFFHALES}
The Manor house was black and white.It had 5 chimneys.The roof had slates on and 11 windows.It had a big lawn with some trees in the background. There was a bush shaped like a duck and a long path made of slabs. There was a hedge at the back of the garden and a yellow border of flowers. There were fancy patterns around the windows. There was a door at the front of the house with steps leading to the garden. It was built about 1533 when Elizabeth the first was crowned.In the later 17th. Century it was used as a private school. The Manor became the property of the Dukes of Sutherland as their Dower House. The building is now on the list of Buildings of Special Architectural or Historic Interest
